Class Item

java.lang.Object
sprite.Sprite
equipment.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
T1AtkRing, T1DefRing, T1DexRing, T1HpRing, T1ManaRing, T1Robe, T1SpeedRing, T1Spell, T1Staff, T1VitRing, T1WisRing, T2AtkRing, T2DefRing, T2DexRing, T2HpRing, T2ManaRing, T2Robe, T2SpeedRing, T2Spell, T2Staff, T2VitRing, T2WisRing, T3AtkRing, T3DefRing, T3DexRing, T3HpRing, T3ManaRing, T3Robe, T3SpeedRing, T3Spell, T3Staff, T3VitRing, T3WisRing
public class Item
extends Sprite
Main class for items Other extended classes have no javadoc because they are just an item with different stats.
Author:
aaaab
